column5: Well I took out my good luck charm tonight... Marissa...  The usuals weren't producing... So I reached into my bag of tricks... And we picked up 3 musky in about 1-1.5 hours...  Marissa was pumped with her 42 incher that put on some Arian displays... Thrashed a couple times and a real nice summersault...      The second fish was marissa's... She doesn't hold em... Just likes to reel em in...  And the third didn't want it's photo taken so it decided to inhale the bait... Took to long unhooking it so we put it back without a pic... Better safe then sorry...
Dude Simple awesome Mike.Looking forward to getting out with you on Saturday for walley. I've been stoked for a week now
very nice pattern on those muskie's.......way to go!!!
Nice going Mike and to make it better you had to change up the program to get to the fish it shows that some times you need to work for them.
Dude, Nice looking fish but your girlfriend needs to shave....

That's the St.Lawrence river pattern... They are mostly beautiful fish...    Yeah... Went to the black perch... Now I have some confidence in that color...     I keep telling her that... Oh well... It makes static sparks when we kiss now... Lol
Nice Job. You really know how to get your musky shows you know what your doing.  I wish my girlfriend enjoyed fishing. She doesn't even care to be in a boat.
I'm a really really lucky guy... She asked me if I could take her out for musky... She said she's been jonesing to get another one...
Hey !!!Why aren't you on the water, preparing the walleye for tomorrow Get yer in gear and get out there  And, we are lucky dudes to have wives who like to fish with us
Letting them rest a bit... I'm catching so many eyes they are gunna figure out what's up... Lol
Beautiful Fish!!!! Gorgeous pattern on them!!
The pattern matches your shorts.  Does she know you named yourself Musky Mike?
...either her fish was a white supremest or perhaps you mean aerial...nice fish either way
It was not a nazi musky... That was a typo... Lol
i clicked into this thread because it says girlfriend.  then I was disappointed with a guy holding a fish.  just kidding haha. Great work for 1.5hours of fishing.
